output.sentences: Fireworks lit up the sky this evening.
It was so fun to celebrate the Fourth of July at my husband's company picnic.
The mosquitos were a battle, but the view was worth it.
The big finale was the best part of the fireworks show!
I can't wait to go back next year and do it again!
